articles.title: La Palma residents told to lock down as volcano lava pours into sea - CNN
articles.description: Authorities in Spain's Canary Islands on Wednesday told residents on the western coast of La Palma to seal doors and windows with tape and wet towels to ward off toxic gases spewed by lava from the Cumbre Vieja volcano as it reached the sea.
